ygData.subject: Re: Mistmoore Battle Drums
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all, Ok, I made level 30 at the weekend and next weekend my guild are planning a Mistmoore castle raid to get the guild leaders new level 5 bard a Gypsy
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all,

Ok, I made level 30 at the weekend and next weekend my guild are planning a
Mistmoore castle raid to get the guild leaders new level 5 bard a Gypsy
lute, I said I'd help and we're gonna get a full group of people ranging
from 30 upto 40 in level.

What I need to know is how hard is this place for our level, would we all
die?
Do the Battle drums and the Gypsy Lute drop in the same room if they do how
rare are the drops because I am getting some MM drums if they drop.

Well I have finally made it to 30 and I'm not even half a bubble into it
yet, it's getting tough for exp an this level 30 hell level is not gonna be
fun. I am gonna try and make level 31 by the weekend (not that the song
will be any use) so that I've got a better chance in MM castle.

Look forward to any info

Madagan

PS. I am going with a fair number of Dark Elves, is it mega bad faction
killing MM stuff??
